info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 6:09PM EDT until June 02 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EDT FOR HUDSON...EASTERN BERGEN...SOUTHERN WESTCHESTER...QUEENS... BRONX...KINGS...ROCKLAND...NEW YORK (MANHATTAN) AND NORTHWESTERN NASSAU COUNTIES... At 608 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hawthorne, or over Tarrytown, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. This severe storm will be near... Tappan around 615 PM EDT. White Plains and Port Chester around 620 PM EDT. Scarsdale around 625 PM EDT. Yonkers and Rye around 630 PM EDT. New Rochelle around 635 PM EDT. Riverdale around 640 PM EDT. East Tremont and Co-op City around 645 PM EDT. Mott Haven and Throgs Neck Bridge around 650 PM EDT. Great Neck and Laguardia Airport around 655 PM EDT. Jamaica and Flushing around 700 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
